translations: n.升降机；举重运动员；小偷

sentences.sentence: Contrary to what one would expect, this kind of shop-lifter is rarely poor.
sentences.translation: 与人们的预期相反，这类商店扒手很少是穷人。

sentences.sentence: Fork lifter may to into the passage of each row of the rack, improving the utility ratio of warehouse.
sentences.translation: 叉车可直接进入巷道内存取货物，仓库利用率高。

sentences.sentence: Chocolate has long been held to be a mood-lifter.
sentences.translation: 长期以来，人们都把巧克力当作心情调节剂。
